Title: Be with You
Writer: Takuji Ichikawa (novel), Su-jin Kang, Jang-Hoon Lee
Actors: Ji-seob So, Ye-jin Son, Yoo-ram Bae, Hyeon-soo Kim
Plot: Woo Jin takes care of his son Ji Ho alone after his wife Soo A passed away. Before she passed away, she promised she would be back on a rainy day one year later. One year later, Soo A appears again, but she does not remember anything.
